name: Autolayout Height Chart
description:
In this remote world, it's harder than ever to know how you (physically) stand among your peers.


This height chart is a great way to visualize that missing part of your day-to-day interactions. Built with Figma's newest autolayout feature, it's easy to customize: just add tick marks for taller (or shorter) folks that you might come across virtually!


Feel free to duplicate / remix to use this with your friends, or just leave a pinned comment on this file!
